title: Hallmark Greeting Card Studio Deluxe 2014
description:
For more than 100 years, Hallmark has designed greeting cards for life's special moments. Hallmark Card Studio 2014 Deluxe extends this tradition, making it easy to create one-of-a-kind Hallmark cards as unique as the people you care for. From birthdays and holidays to special occasions and every day greetings, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find the perfect card for virtually any occasion. 

 But cards are just the beginning. Bridge the miles between family and friends with photo cards, postcards, stationery sets and party invitations-all customized with your heart-felt message. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s easy with exclusive Hallmark writing tips and ideas included right in the software! Plus, using the built-in Digital Photo Editor, you can easily crop, fix and apply special effects to photos before adding them to calendars, scrapbook pages, award certificates and more. Then simply print, email or share on Facebook and other popular social media websites! 

 With 14,000+ designs, 20,000+ premium graphics, 11,000+ sentiments, exclusive fonts, an Event Planner and much more, the creative possibilities are endless. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s amazing what you and Hallmark can do together!


For those asking for the 2014 version, here is it!!!
